data.author: Chris Lalancette
data.message:
Update the code to use a non-deprecated header. (#72)

* Update the code to use a non-deprecated header.

This requires a little additional work, since Humble
does not have that header.

Signed-off-by: Chris Lalancette <clalancette@gmail.com>

data.author: Chris Lalancette
data.message:
Fix the style throughout the codebase to conform to ROS 2 style. (#63)

* Fix the style throughout the codebase to conform to ROS 2 style.

There are no functional changes in here, only changes to the
style.

Also enable the linters so further contributions will have
to conform.

Signed-off-by: Chris Lalancette <clalancette@openrobotics.org>

data.author: Chris Lalancette
data.message:
Cleanup the CMakeLists.txt (#51)

In particular:
1.  Change setting of the C++ standard to use CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD
2.  Change setting of the extra compiler flags
3.  Use target_include_directories instead of include_directories.

Signed-off-by: Chris Lalancette <clalancette@openrobotics.org>

can never be uninitialized.
